name: Can you beat 12 String?
description:
This is an alpha build demo of my upcoming Boss Rush game that I have begun devloging on my YouTube channel (the same as my Itch name).  This version of the game contains a mini parkour section (just for shits and giggles) and 1 main boss (12 string). 

There is no tutorial so I suggest you mess around with the controls beforehand. These being: 

L mouse - Light attack

R mouse -  Heavy attack

Shift - Dash

Space - Jump/Double Jump

S, C, Ctrl - Crouch

Left Alt - Death Animation ON/OFF

XBOX CONTROLLER CONTROLS (should work with other controllers as well):

X - Light attack

Y - Heavy attack

Left trigger - Dash

A - Jump/Double Jump

Down on left stick/B - Crouch

Up on left stick - Interact

The boss is located on the right side of spawn. You may take any screenshots or recordings of the test at your leisure. 

REMEMBER: The build is not final.  All suggestions and feedback that you may have are appreciated, thank you.
